meanings.sent1: The old bike left outside was rustable and soon turned orange.
meanings.sent2: Metal tools are rustable if not properly stored.
meanings.sent3: The knight's rustable armor made him look like a warrior from ancient times.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned ship was a rustable relic of the past, slowly decaying.
meanings.sent5: The rustable gate creaked as it swung open, revealing the overgrown garden.

meanings.definition: Able to be affected by rust.
meanings.sent1: The rustable car showed signs of corrosion after years of neglect.
meanings.sent2: Iron is a rustable material when exposed to moisture.
meanings.sent3: The treasure chest was made of rustable metal, adding to its mysterious allure.
meanings.sent4: The bridge's rustable beams creaked under the weight of the passing train.
meanings.sent5: The rustable fence posts sagged with the weight of the climbing vines.

meanings.sent1: Living near the coast, the rustable boats needed frequent maintenance.
meanings.sent2: The rustable pipes in the basement were starting to leak.
meanings.sent3: The antique clock's rustable gears ticked with a soothing rhythm.
meanings.sent4: The rustable chains on the swing set jingled in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The rustable hinges on the gate groaned as it was pushed open.
